attributes.action: Save our post offices in Lancaster district
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, strongly believe that the following post offices should not be shut in the latest wave of cost cutting.

The post offices under threat are in:

Greaves Drive, Lancaster
Yealand Redmayne
Ridge Estate
Kellet Road in Carnforth
Carr Lane in Middleton
Halton Road in Nether Kellet
Quernmore
Glasson Dock
